update access_info set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_reason = #{accessReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_name = #{accessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_idcard = #{accessIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_phonenumber = #{accessPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_time = #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interviewee_name = #{intervieweeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interviewee_phonenumber = #{intervieweePhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_verify = #{isVerify,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from access_info a where 1=1
and a.open_id = #{parameter.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.access_idcard like concat('%',#{parameter.accessIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.access_name like concat('%',#{parameter.accessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.access_phonenumber like concat('%',#{parameter.accessPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by ${parameter.orders}
